name: Edinburgh Compatible Context Editor
short_description: ECCE is a text editor designed by Hamish Dewar at Edinburgh University in the 1960's, which is still in daily use.  Several historical implementations of ECCE exist in various languages.  This implementation in portable C is for modern computers.
